name: Manglepaw
description:
This game is presented in the style of old 1st-person point & click adventure games, with an emphasis on moody atmosphere and surreal environments. Strange denizens pepper the vast halls of this cryptic building.


Learn the mysteries of the various rooms and complete a handful of puzzle minigames to reach the "true end". Or just have a relaxed time exploring and meeting folks, because most of the station is accessible from when you first enter the building.

Will one of these fine folk become your artistic muse!?!?




.........and more folks to find, too!
